entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
